title: Font for Cole Haan?
content: Does anyone know what font Cole Haan uses in their logo on the Web?
author: Margaret Gillis

comments.content:
Please include an image or link - no one is going to take the time to search this.

Also, once you find an image, try the Type ID forum:  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150406024917/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")
